job.title: Site Reliability Engineer // Azure // Remote
job.description: A Software Development company that develops mobile threat defense software solutions is looking to bring on a talented Site Reliability Engineer Youd be joining their Dallasbased team of unique problem solvers with a multitude of skills and perspectivesbrbrAs an SRE youll be focused primarily on running better production application and systems creating a strict engineering discipline and utilizing software and systems to help find creative engineering solutions to operational problemsbrbrstronguSkills amp Experiencebrustrongul li4 years of experience in a DevOpsSRE environment li liAzure DevOpsli liExperience working in both Azure and AWS environments is highly preferredli liProficient in Java andor Powershell scripting li liWorking knowledge of Terraform and Ansibleli liDockerKubernetes li brbrulstronguThe Offerbrustrongul liCompetitive Salary Up to 155Kyear DOEli brbrulstronguYou Will Receive The Following Benefitsbrustrongul liMedical Dental Visionli li401kli liCasual work environment li liFull remote work optionli brulemApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a fulltime basis now and in the futurebrbremstrongPosted Bystrong Carolyn Regimbalbrbr
